title: The Devil Behind Us
description: The Devil Behind Us is the much-anticipated sequel to The Devil Between Us.After enduring unimaginable tragedy and heartbreaking loss, Jessica “Jesse” Pratt has actually found happiness in her life again. A relationship she once thought lost forever has been restored. She has managed to win the heart of Abby, the woman she loves. And, she is no longer forced to hide her true identity. Just when it feels like she will finally get the happy ending she never dreamed possible, things take an unforeseen twist.Now, Abby is the one harboring a secret—one so powerful it could rip apart the threads of their newly woven relationship. Forced to make an agonizing choice, Abby struggles to make the most difficult decision of her life.
author: S.C.  Wilson
